text:
Mentioned in #379. You can pass 'colorbar' via kwargs into plot_img but you have to read the code to know that it is possible. Adding an explicit colorbar argument + docstring would make it a lot more obvious.

Probably worth to check that plot_img arguments are a superset of the other plot_\* functions arguments.
title: plot_img should have colorbar as explicit argument
